judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Desmond J. McTighe, with him Philip D. Weiss, and McTighe, Brown, Weiss, Bonner & Stewart, for appellants.
J. Brooke Aker, with him James L. Hollinger, and Smith, Aker, Grossman, Hollinger and Jenkins, for appellees.
Galvin S. Draper, Jr., and Menin, Wilson & Flick, for Lloyd II. Rainwater, III and Girard Trust Bank, executors, appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Merry Estate.
Argued November 20, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Desmond J. McTighe, with him Philip D. Weiss, and McTighe, Brown, Weiss, Bonner & Stewart, for appellants.
J. Brooke Aker, with him James L. Hollinger, and Smith, Aker, Grossman, Hollinger and Jenkins, for appellees.
Galvin S. Draper, Jr., and Menin, Wilson & Flick, for Lloyd II. Rainwater, III and Girard Trust Bank, executors, appellees.
May 22, 1974 :
